title.rendered: Defense Security/Cybersecurity Authorization Working Group Lead/ Cyber Eng. Sr.

content.rendered:
Knowledge and Experience:

  • Overall, 10 years of experience
  • 6 or more years leading Risk Management
  • 5 or more years IT program management experience leading audits and inspections in DoD/Federal environment
  • Functional area expertise in National and DoD IT policy. The contractor shall have expert level knowledge and experience as a technical expert providing technical direction, interpretation, and alternatives. The contractor shall have expert level knowledge in guiding the successful completion of major programs and may function in a project leadership role. The contractor shall have expertise in a particular area of Information Systems Architecture, Telecommunications Systems Design, Architecture, Implementation, Information Systems Integration, Software Development Methodologies, Security Engineering, Communications and Network Systems Management.

Ft. Meade, MD: On-site performance is required for this task.  Partial telework may be authorized for this task at the discretion of the Government.  Telework must be approved in writing by the COR.

Education Requirement:

  • Bachelor’s degree (IT-related field preferred)
